Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP50
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP50.View

Class ClientView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP50.Utils.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP50.View.ClientView
Direct Known Subclasses:
CLI, GuiView
public abstract class ClientView
extends Observable
ClientView is an abstract class that will be implemented by GUI and CLI
